name: The Vega Conflict

setting.theme: Cold war between authoritarian empire and scrappy independents, turning hot
setting.tone: Gritty space opera with moral ambiguity. No clear heroes.

lore_summary: Fifty years after the Collapse Wars shattered the old Earth Federation, two powers contest the resource-rich Vega System. The Terran Hegemony—a militaristic successor state—seeks to reunify humanity under its iron grip. The Free Traders Confederacy—a loose alliance of independent captains, stations, and frontier worlds—fights for autonomy and survival. The conflict has simmered for years, but recent events are pushing both sides toward open war.

starting_state.situation: The Hegemony has been building forces at the jump point. Free Trader raids have intensified. War seems inevitable.

agent.captain_reva.arc: Haunted veteran seeking redemption while protecting her crew

agent.kai_chen.arc: Young pilot with secret connection to both sides

hegemony_victory.condition: presence.hegemony.vega.influence >= 0.9 AND presence.hegemony.vega.control == true for 30 ticks

narrative_hooks.description: Kai Chen is Admiral Chen's estranged child
reveal_conditions: High-stakes scene between Kai and Hegemony forces

narrative_hooks.description: Reva knows the location of a hidden Hegemony weapons cache
Elements within Hegemony are planning a coup against the Supreme Commander

suggested_drilldowns.description: Reva briefs her crew before a dangerous raid
Raider ambush on a Hegemony supply convoy
Negotiating with Zara for critical intelligence
